rooms.name: Entrance Hallway and Reception Area
rooms.description: A welcoming area designed with Bohemian decor elements such as vibrant colors, textures, and reclaimed materials. The space is wheelchair accessible with smooth transitions.

rooms.name: Open-Concept Living & Kitchen Area
rooms.description: A split-level design merges a spacious living area with an adjacent kitchen. The layout maximizes natural light from the west-facing windows and adheres to Vastu principles by aligning key activity areas.

features.description: Colorful patterns, eclectic furniture, and reclaimed wood finishes.
Level transition is seamlessly integrated with ramp access.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated entertainment zone designed for audio-visual immersion. The room features acoustically treated walls and comfortable seating arrangements, ensuring optimal viewing angles.

features.description: Specialized wall panels to minimize noise interference.
State-of-the-art AV system with surround sound.

rooms.name: Private Gym Area
rooms.description: A compact, functional gym designed for personal workouts with equipment that is wheelchair accessible and space-efficient. Natural lighting complements the vibrant Bohemian theme.

features.description: Flooring and equipment placements are optimized for wheelchair use.
Ensures clear line of sight and ease of movement.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A modern, accessible bathroom with grab bars and sufficient turning radius for wheelchair users. Designed in a Bohemian style with mosaic tiles and vintage fixtures.

features.description: Non-slip flooring, grab bars, and wheelchair-friendly layout.

rooms.name: Garden Access Corridor
rooms.description: A landscaped pathway that connects the living area to the expansive garden. Designed with wheelchair-accessible paths, seating areas, and plantings that complement the Bohemian aesthetic.

features.description: Smooth, flat surfaces with gentle slopes.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.accessibility: Wheelchair accessible with an automated door opener.

openings.name: West Facing Windows
openings.description: Maximizes natural light in the afternoon and complies with Vastu guidelines for west-facing properties.

openings.name: Garden Entrance Door
openings.description: Provides direct access to the large garden and wheelchair-friendly garden paths.

features.description: A spacious garden designed with native plants and Bohemian-style landscaping to promote a serene outdoor environment.

vastu_considerations.recommendation: Place the main entrance on the north or east side to enhance positive energy flow, while ensuring accessibility.
Positioned towards the south-east corner to align with traditional Vastu principles.
